bibl.title: A Re-examination of 1Corinthians 14, 23-24 in Light of Roman Census Declarations.

series.title: Recherches et Rencontres. Publications de la Faculté des Lettres de Genève.

bibl.note: Introduction. - Modern readings of ἰδιῶται and ἄπιστοι. - The openness of Christian worship. - Evidence of shared house ownership in Roman Egypt. - Conclusion.

bibl.title: Actes du 26e Congrès international de papyrologie. Genève, 16-21 août 2010.

bibl.seg: Weaver Joel A., A Re-examination of 1Corinthians 14, 23-24 in Light of Roman Census Declarations.

Paul Schubert (Éd.), Actes du 26e Congrès international de papyrologie. Genève, 16-21 août 2010 = Recherches et Rencontres. Publications de la Faculté des Lettres de Genève. 30 (Genève, 2012) pp. 817-821.
Introduction. - Modern readings of ἰδιῶται and ἄπιστοι. - The openness of Christian worship. - Evidence of shared house ownership in Roman Egypt. - Conclusion.
